description: Creates a domain unit in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to crate a domain unit.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the domain unit.

parameters.name: parentDomainUnitIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the parent domain unit.

nested_items.name: ancestorDomainUnitIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the ancestor domain units.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the domain unit was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the domain unit.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain where the domain unit was created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: owners
nested_items.description: The owners of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: groupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit group.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The ID of teh domain unit user.

nested_items.name: parentDomainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent domain unit.
